Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel H2 Elche in Elche, you'll be in the business district and convenient to Palmeral of Elche and Altamira Palace. This hotel is within close proximity of Santa Maria Basilica and Huerto del Cura.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 63 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
This hotel has 3 meeting rooms available for events.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel H2 Elche in Elche, you'll be in the business district and convenient to Palmeral of Elche and Altamira Palace. This hotel is within close proximity of Santa Maria Basilica and Huerto del Cura.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palmeral of Elche - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Altamira Palace - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Santa Maria Basilica - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Huerto del Cura - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Estadio Manuel Martinez Valero - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Alenda Golf Course - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Pola Amusement Park - 15.7 km / 9.7 mi
Gran Playa - 16.2 km / 10.1 mi
Wholesale Food Market - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi
Castillo Fortaleza - 17.3 km / 10.8 mi
Municipal Aquarium of Santa Pola - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi
Arenales Beach - 17.7 km / 11 mi
Carabassi Beach - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi
Puerta de Alicante Shopping Center - 18.9 km / 11.8 mi
El Corte Ingles Shopping Center - 21 km / 13.1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel H2 Elche is Alicante (ALC-Alicante Intl.) - 14.2 km / 8.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
